org.jboss.windup.config.parser

Interface ElementHandler<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndHandler, ClassificationHandler, HintHandler, IterationHandler, JavaClassHandler, LinkHandler, LogHandler, MatchesHandler, MessageHandler, NamespaceHandler, NotHandler, OrHandler, ParamHandler, PerformHandler, PhaseHandler, RuleHandler, RuleProviderHandler, RulesHandler, TrueHandler, TypeReferenceLocationHandler, WhenHandler, WhereHandler, XmlFileHandler, XSLTParameterHandler, XSLTTransformationHandler

    public interface ElementHandler<T>
    Parses the given Element and returns a result, that will depend upon the underlying implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T processElement(ParserContext handlerManager, Element element)
      Parses the provided Element with the given ParserContext.

    • Method Detail

      • processElement

        T processElement(ParserContext handlerManager,
               Element element)
                 throws ConfigurationException
        Parses the provided Element with the given ParserContext. See also XMLRuleProviderLoader.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
